steps.title: I perform Quick Search by "pain"
I choose "All" option in the 'Search scope' dropdown
I check if the chosen option "All" is displayed in the 'Search scope' dropdown on new Home Page
I click on button 'Search' on panel 'Quick Search'
the results table header should contain text "pain"

substeps.message: The report type corresponding to selected dataset is  displayed

steps.title: I check that only report types corresponding to selected dataset "All" in Search Scope dropdown is displayed

substeps.message: Datasets aredisplayed above the Refine Search panel of the results page

steps.title: I verify whether the datasets are available above the refine search panel
